cast.overview: A young fighter named Kham must go to Australia to retrieve his stolen elephant. With the help of a Thai-born Australian detective, Kham must take on all comers, including a gang led by an evil woman and her two deadly bodyguards.
cast.title: The Protector

also_known_as: เดวิด อัศวนนท์
เดวิด ชัชวาลย์ อัศวนนท์
details.biography: David Asavanond is a Thai-French actor born in France from a French mother and a half French half Thai father and then raised in Thailand from young age. At the age of 12, he was sent to study abroad in boarding schools in England until Asavanond was 19. He studied at Boston University and acquired a degree in Psychology.
details.name: David Asavanond
